recipesJson.name: Strawberry lemonade (On Point)
recipesJson.author: Jbirdy34
recipesJson.description: Had some real flavors lemonades that tasted amazing with the finger test and they smell just as good so figured i would try and mix something up out of um. . This tastes just like a strawberry lemonade. I didn't even use sweetener in it. Try it out if you have the flavors you won't be disappointed .
